verse.name: c1
verse.lines: "Jesus," O how sweet the name! newline "Jesus," every day the same! newline "Jesus," let all saints proclaim newline Its worthy praise forever!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The name of Jesus is so sweet, newline I love its music to repeat. newline It makes my joys full and complete, newline The precious name of Jesus!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I love the name of Him whose heart, newline Knows all my griefs and bears a part, newline Who bids all anxious fears depart, newline I love the name of Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: That name I fondly love to hear; newline It never fails my heart to cheer; newline It's music dries the falling tear. newline Exalt the name of Jesus!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: No word of man can ever tell newline How sweet the name I love so well. newline O let its praises ever swell! newline O praise the name of Jesus!
